name: Hani
greetingText: I really like your name, by the way!
wishText: May God always be with you and bless every step you take Hani
text1: We back again on my favorite date, I always remember this date do you know :P
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Hani! God bless you always ...
text2: It's time to send a simple birthday wish.
outroText: On your special day, I wish you all the happiness and joy the world can offer. You light up every room you enter, and I hope your birthday is just as bright and beautiful as you are. Happy Birthday!
replayText: I hope you like it, and ... You have someone now?
